        public void createNewRequest(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String content)
                      throws InvalidTitleException
        Create new request.
        Parameters:
        username: - a User's username in string.
        title: - a request's title in string.
        content: - a request's content in string.
        Throws:
        InvalidTitleException - if the title already exists.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a boolean represent the status of request, e.g ture - addressed or false - pending

      • getRequestsFrom

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getRequestsFrom(java.lang.String username)
        return all requests from single user.
        Parameters:
        username: - a user's username in string.
        Returns:
        an array list of list of Strings which include title and content of each request from this user.

      • getAllRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getAllRequests()
        return all requests in the system.
        Returns:
        an array list of list of Strings which include title and content of each requests in this system.

      • getAllUnsolvedRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getAllUnsolvedRequests()
        return all requests in the system.
        Returns:
        an array list of list of Strings which include title and content of each pending requests in this system.

      • getAllSolvedRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getAllSolvedRequests()
        return all requests in the system.
        Returns:
        an array list of list of Strings which include title and content of each addressed requests in this system.

      • recallAllRequestsFrom

        Parameters:
        username: - a user's username in string.
        Throws:
        NoSuchRequestException - when the request does not exist.

      • recallSingleRequest

        public void recallSingleRequest(java.lang.String title)
                         throws NoSuchRequestException
        recall one specific request from one user.
        Parameters:
        title: - the title of a request in string.
        Throws:
        NoSuchRequestException - if the request does not exist.
